text:
August 16, 1957
Mr..Raymond D« Cheydleur, Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
Radio Station WFSU
Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida
Dear Ray:
Think anyone on the committee could help Art with this
problem now? Vonder if you’d reply on this. I’d guess what Sam is
doing isn’t exactly what Art needs.
Have numerous replies. So far, no new names of research
personal.
Best regards,
f
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJS/dfc
Enclosure
CC: Art Hungerford
